entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Melfort
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:21 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -27.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Melfort 1:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -27.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 104.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -34
Dewpoint: -31.2°C
Wind: SSW 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022
